snippet: Gov. Dannel P. Malloy presented a nearly $40 billion two-year budget that proposes to overhaul the aging transportation infrastructure in Connecticut, cuts the state sales tax and revamps the state’s criminal justice system.
abstract: Connecticut Gov Dannel P Malloy unveils $40 billion two-year budget; key features include an overhaul of state's transportation infrastructure, cuts to sales tax and changes to the criminal justice system.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Dannel P. Malloy presented a nearly $40 billion two-year budget that proposes to overhaul the aging transportation infrastructure in Connecticut, cuts the state sales tax and revamps the state’s criminal justice system.

headline.main: Focus on Transportation and Justice System in Connecticut Governor’s Budget
headline.print_headline: Malloy’s Budget Aids Transportation and Cuts Tax
